metadata.name: A new day
metadata.description:
A morning hike to reach a beautiful lake in the middle of the Dolomiti, the lake Sorapis.
It was still dark when I put my backpack on and started walking, only looking at the path and what the light on my lamp could show.
After two hours I reached this spot, the sun was rising, a bit of fog was covering the valley, the lake was not too far, but thought to stop here for a moment, by myself, to admire the beauty of a new day.
We all need a somewhere place where to feel in peace with ourselves and everything.

[1/1 original: 6675 × 4455 - Nikon D800 - 56mm - f11 - 1/100sec]
